祫，汉语词语，意思是古时天子诸侯宗庙祭礼之一。
祫, a Chinese word, means one of the sacrificial rites in the ancestral temple of the emperor and princes in ancient times.

祫字的基本解释

祫
xiá
古代天子或诸侯把远近祖先的神主集合在太庙里进行祭祀。

祫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiá］
［《廣韻》侯夾切，入洽，匣。］
古代天子诸侯宗庙祭礼之一。集合远近祖先的神主于太祖庙大合祭。三年丧毕时举行一次，次年禘祭后又举行一次，以后每五年一次。

祫字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【示字部】　祫； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页843第05
【唐韻】侯夾切【集韻】【韻會】轄夾切【正韻】胡夾切，?音洽。【說文】大合祭先祖親疏遠近也。【公羊傳·文二年】大事者何，大祫也。大祫者何，合祭也。毀廟之主，?於太祖，未毀廟之主，皆升合食於太祖。【禮·王制】天子犆礿，祫禘，祫嘗，祫烝。○按凡合祭曰祫，禘嘗烝皆合祭，故皆言祫。據此則知天子別無祫祭。凡諸經傳所言祫皆指禘、嘗、烝之祭也。但烝、嘗二祭，止太祖及羣廟，而禘則上追太祖所自出，下及毀廟之主，其祫較烝、嘗爲大，故《春秋》於文二年八月之禘，書爲大事，而《公羊》釋之爲大祫也。互詳禘字註。

祫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
祫字的起名意思

暂无。

祫
Basic explanation of words
祫
xiá
In ancient times, the emperor or the princes gathered the gods and lords of the ancestors far and near to worship in the Taimiao.
祫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiá］
["Guang Yun" Hou clip cut, enter into contact, box. ]
One of the sacrificial rituals in the ancestral temple of the emperor and princes in ancient times. Gather the gods of ancestors from far and near to the Taizu Temple for a joint sacrifice. It is held once at the end of the three-year funeral, and again after the next year, and every five years thereafter.
祫

The master who destroyed the temple, Yu Taizu, and the one who did not destroy the temple, were all promoted and fed to Taizu. [Rite·Royal System] The emperor's sorrow, 祫禘, 祫 taste, 祫烝. ○According to where the joint sacrifice is called 祫, the 禘 tastes the 烝 all the joint sacrifices, so all are said to be 祫. Based on this, we know that the emperor has no other sacrifices. All the sutras mentioned in the Scriptures refer to the sacrifices of 禘, Taste, and Sui. However, the two sacrifices of Sui and Taste are limited to the Taizu and the group temples, while the Qi is chasing after the Taizu who came out and the owner of the ruined temple. It is bigger than Sui and tasted. Therefore, "Spring and Autumn" was written in the second year of the eighth year. The book of the moon is a major event, and the "Gongyang" is also interpreted as a great event. Mutual detailed notes on the word 禘.
